page.title: 15EVENTS/CUSTOMS W.READING
page.content: The playground party was our contribution to the{West Reading {festival.}We were very busy all week, the whole school helped prepare and people in the area came to join in on the Wednesday afternoon .there were all kinds of things _raffle,face painting,dancing and lots of stalls with games.Most things were free and those that weren't, were only 2p for children.There were dances from all over the world.I did some country dancing and feeling tests.My friend Simmi did some Indian dancing,she looked very pretty.I had my face painted by a mum.All the money went to Helen House. Miriam Hunter & Simmi Gupta 10yrs Wilson School
